DOC.brief_summary: The TRAIL study was conducted to examine the effects of escalating doses of an ACE inhibitor, trandolapril, on lowering blood pressure in Stage 1-2 hypertensive patients.
DOC.brief_title: Canadian Study of Trandolapril on Blood Pressure in Hypertensive Patients (TRAIL)
DOC.criteria: Stage 1 or 2 Hypertension Uncontrolled diabetes Subject has a hypersensitivity to ACE inhibitor
